Here are the formal defnition. Definition 1.1 (Complex Numbers ) A complex number is an ordered pair \((x, y)\), where \(x, y \in \mathbb{R}\), but we will write this as \(x + yi\). The set of all complex numbers is denoted by \(\mathbb{C}\): \[\mathbb{C} = \{x + yi \,|\, x, y \in \mathbb{R}\}.\] Addition and multiplication on \(\mathbb{C}\) are defined by \[(x + yi) + (u + vi) = (x + u) + (y + v)i,\] \[(x + yi)(u + vi) = (xu - yv) + (xv + yu)i;\] here \(x, y, u, v \in \mathbb{R}\)
